a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Freshwater use by aggregated region, 1901 to 2010
Global freshwater withdrawals for agricultural, industrial and domestic uses by aggregated regional groupings.
OECD members are defined as countries who were members in 2010 and their membership was carried back in
time. BRICS countries are Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa. ROW refers to the Rest of the World,
Data source: Global International Geosphere-Biosphere Programme (IGB)
